content: Can you try the workaround discussed in the link below. https://github.com/thunderbird/thunderbird-android/issues/4602#issuecomment-3669665246
creator: platform34

content: Do the emails appear in more than one folder within the account, or have more that one folder label assigned. This could be the cause. The same can also occur if you select, as example, unifying Gmail's "All Mail" and "Inbox" folders.
creator: platform34

content: Thank you for your answer. The probem was that both the inbox and all mail were unified. Greatly appreciated. This was really annoying me!
creator: laurencejackson90
